page.title: 19NEWTOWN METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: NEWTOWN METHODIST CHURCH,GT.YARMOUTH The church is quite big, with a large round clock(belonging to the corporation) hanging over the pavement & dominating the front. Inside the Church is a hand-made font, a tribute to a Mrs.Doris Adams who died Nov.1969. About 25 normally attend, but the numbers have decreased in the last two years. Most attend in family groups. Mrs. Brown says,"I remember when I used to come to the Church with my family. It used to be nearly full, but now we only get about 15 people. My family all have children of their own and don't bother coming. I have been coming ever since I remember." The Minister is Rosemary Wakin, who came two years ago.
